POST /accounts/{account_id}/browser-rend.description: Fetches rendered HTML content from provided URL or HTML. Check available options like `gotoOptions` and `waitFor*` to control page load behaviour.

parameters.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.
parameters.name: cacheTTL

schema.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.

addScriptTag.description: Adds a `<script>` tag into the page with the desired URL or content.

addStyleTag.description: Adds a `<link rel="stylesheet">` tag into the page with the desired URL or a `<style type="text/css">` tag with the content.

allowRequestPattern.description: Only allow requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

allowResourceTypes.description: Only allow requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

bestAttempt.description: Attempt to proceed when 'awaited' events fail or timeout.

html.description:
Set the content of the page, eg: `

Hello World!!

`. Either `html` or `url` must be set.

rejectRequestPattern.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

rejectResourceTypes.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

userAgent.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

waitForSelector.description: Wait for the selector to appear in page. Check [options](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.page.waitforselector).

waitForTimeout.description: Waits for a specified timeout before continuing.

400.description: The request contains errors or didn't properly encode content.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/browser-rend.description: Takes a screenshot of a webpage from provided URL or HTML. Control page loading with `gotoOptions` and `waitFor*` options. Customize screenshots with `viewport`, `fullPage`, `clip` and others.
